data.title: "History Secrets" Charlotte et Maximilien, les sombres héros de Mexico (TV Episode 2019)
data.meta_description: Charlotte et Maximilien, les sombres héros de Mexico: Directed by Benjamin Lehrer. With Stéphane Bern, Charlotte Aftassi, Florence Coste, Pascal Decombert. Emperor Maximilian and his wife Charlotte, two sovereigns from Austria and Belgium, placed on a throne made-to-measure for them on the other side of the Atlantic, in Mexico. Despite their best intentions they were rapidly overtaken by events as they became players in a drama that was about to unfold.
